attributes.action: charge with manslaughter nhs doctors where death occurs through negligence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are hearing more and more about deaths occuring in our nhs hospitals due to under-trained doctors and nurses being unable to do their job properly.  We then get told that there will be an enquiry to ensure the same things doesnt happen again, but ofcourse they do happen again.  Any doctor found guilty of negligence that leads to a preventable death should be bought to justice and charged with manslaughter.

rejection.details: Government does not press charges - that is a decision for the police or Crown Prosecution Service.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
